net.krglok.realms.manager

Class TradeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.krglok.realms.manager.TradeManager

  • public class TradeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    the trade manager realize the trading task for the settlement - sell order - buy order - route order the manager can interact with the world and send commands and requests to other managers the trade manager take trading requests from the settlemanager
    Author:
    oduda
